when someone gets money from another person by using threats
a thorough search of a place or a person
No weapons were found during the shakedown.
a period of time when people start to get used to a new arrangement and it becomes more effective
a period of time when prices are falling on a financial market
a final test of a boat, plane etc before it is put into general use
The new system is in its shakedown phase.
a period of time when people start to get used to a new arrangement and it becomes more effective
The company is expected to enter its final shakedown phase by the middle of September.
a period of time when prices are falling on a financial market
The shakedown in engineering shares seems to be nearly over, with only minor declines yesterday.
the process of getting money from someone, using threats
He had banked $25,000 in one day from the shakedown of bucket-shop proprietors, shady dealers in the stock market.
